import React from 'react'; import { NavLink, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './DashboardLayout.css'; // Import the new CSS const DashboardLayout = ({ children }) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('token'); localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/login'); }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
HFP Dashboard
  • Home
  • Submit Request
  • My Submissions
  • Profile
    • {/* New Links */}
  • Live Rate
  • Rate History
  • AI Rubber Expert
  • Rubber Calculator
  • Latex Selling
{/* Main Content */}
{children}
); }; export default DashboardLayout;
